channel.title: Server Mysql issue
channel.description:
The Minecraft server lost connection to the server database at 2013-02-25 15:14:56, at this point it is back up and running but during that time any lwc protections created will not have been saved so if you placed any chest or changed any lwc permissions during that time I advise you to go and check that chest/permission again. Currently I do not know what caused the issue or if it will happen again.
Temporarily downgraded LWC plugin.

item.title: Server Mysql issue
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:498882”]The inter-socket parsing module had a bad connection to the main database syndication cache - unlikely to happen again :)[/quote]You would think so but it happen again.

Read full topic
